product_name: Icebreaker Siren Sweetheart Underwear T-Shirt - Women's
long_description: Soft, comfortable and ready for activity, the Icebreaker Siren Sweetheart T-Shirt for women uses the natural feel of merino wool to enhance comfort on cool days. Made of soft, nonirritating merino wool with a touch of spandex for stretch, the Icebreaker Siren Sweetheart T-Shirt for women resists odors naturally. Merino wool wicks away moisture, dries quickly and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. UPF 50+ sun protection. Slim fit; machine washable, line dry or dry flat in shade.
short_description: Soft, comfortable and ready for activity, the Icebreaker Siren Sweetheart T-Shirt for women uses the natural feel of merino wool to enhance comfort on cool days.
